channel.title: I need help with duping
channel.description: Ok in my server you can put items up accept on first trade then the play with the items up accpets and delcines really fast and trades the other person then they accept and log out and the items get duped. ive searched tried many things and cant get it fixed. someone help me?

item.title: I need help with duping
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

			case 13218:
				long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
				client other = c.getClient(c.trade_reqId);
				if (!c.validClient(c.trade_reqId))
					break;
				if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton < 1000) {
					c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
					break;
				} else {
					c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
				}
				c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
				if (c.inTrade && c.tradeConfirmed && other.tradeConfirmed
						&& !c.tradeConfirmed2) {
					c.hasAccepted = true;
					c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
					c.tradeConfirmed2 = true;
					c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
					if (other.tradeConfirmed2) {
						c.giveItems();
						other.giveItems();
						c.savegame(false);
						other.savegame(false);
						c.sM("Accepted trade.");
						other.sM("Accepted trade.");
						c.lastAction = now;
						other.lastAction = now;
						break;
					}
other.sendQuest("Other player has accepted.", 3535);
					c.sendQuest("Waiting for other player...", 3535);
					c.hasAccepted = true;
				}
				break;

travis you see this here:

 c.lastButton < 1000) {

remove that!

then it should look like this

					if (System.currentTimeMillis()  {
					c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
					break;

:]
that should remove the duping faggots aha

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with duping
item.dc:creator: @Travis_02 Travis_02
item.description:
@Travis_02 wrote:

i tried changing it to client if thats what you mean the cs and it didnt work. what do i do shall i post the code im getting error on?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 09:27:46 pm[/size][hr] case 13218: long now = System.currentTimeMillis(); client other = c.getClient(c.trade_reqId); if (!c.validClient(c.trade_reqId)) break; if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton < 1000) { c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); break; } else { c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); } c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (c.inTrade && c.tradeConfirmed && other.tradeConfirmed && !c.tradeConfirmed2) { c.hasAccepted = true; c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.tradeConfirmed2 = true; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (other.tradeConfirmed2) { c.giveItems(); other.giveItems(); c.savegame(false); other.savegame(false); c.sM("Accepted trade."); other.sM("Accepted trade."); c.lastAction = now; other.lastAction = now; break; } other.sendQuest("Other player has accepted.", 3535); c.sendQuest("Waiting for other player...", 3535); c.hasAccepted = true; } break;

and then im getting clickingmost.java cannont find symbol c. or anything that has to do with it

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with duping
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Client c

You only need to add the “c.” if it is not in the client class or whatever class it is directed to.
